summary: On a trip around the world, every day feels like Saturday. A MAP FOR SATURDAY reveals a world of long-term, solo travel through the stories of trekkers on four continents. The documentary ... See full summary »
cast: Scott Erikson|Rebecca Filmer|Sabrina Hezinger|Kate McNair|Yuba Paudel|Jens Roessler|Brook Silva-Braga|Christian Wessinger|Kym Willan
title: A Map for Saturday
